name: Escape the Valley
description:
My first time making a 3D-First-Person-Exploration game.

Controls: (no controller yet)

  • Movement: WSAD
  • Shoot: Left-Click
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Use Terminal: Right-Click
  • Pause: ESC

Story

He hesitated to escape before, but he is trying to escape now.  He is almost there... The giant drones ships are almost impossible to defeat, so can he avoid their gaze?  While being pursued by the oppressive overlords and fighting off the minions, can he find the 8 terminals and escape through the dimensional portal?
